column2: We are looking for an ambitious Junior Accountant to provide support to the financial department by managing daily accounting tasks. You will be part of a team of professionals working to maintain order and transparency for the company s finances. Preparing financial statements and reporting are a large part of the junior accountant s day-to-day work.      The ideal candidate will be well-versed in accounting principles and able to work comfortably with numbers and attention to detail. The goal is to contribute to the overall efficient operation of the department and help the company be fully aware of its financial condition. This way it can make the right decisions and accomplish long-term success. column2: We are looking for a dynamic Revenue Manager to be the newest member of our Revenue team in this fast-growing, truly globally distributed company. This role offers an ideal opportunity for individuals eager to lead and drive significant change within a rapidly growing software technology company! Based in India, this position will report directly to the Senior Revenue Manager.   Do you have 5+ years of experience in revenue accounting and excel in fast-paced, globally expanding technology environments? Are you passionate about optimizing accounting systems and developing streamlined processes that integrate these systems?    What You Will Be Doing:    Collaborate in leading the complete revenue closing cycle to ensure the timely achievement of the close timeline, and addressing issues as they arise   Coordinate revenue closing schedules with IT, G/L, and FP&A Teams   Find opportunities for process enhancement and improving existing processes.   Be a key contributor to the month-end revenue close by ensuring precise revenue reporting in RevPro through the preparation of journal entries, account reconciliations, and data validations.   Collaborate with SOX and Audit teams to test key controls related to revenue   Participate in User Acceptance Testing (UAT) for RevPro and NetSuite   Coach and grow other Revenue team members   Help with ad hoc projects and collaborate with colleagues on a variety of initiatives as Elastic continues to scale    What You Bring Along:    Bachelors degree or equivalent experience in Accounting or finance. CPA or progress towards CPA certification preferred.   Experience in RevPro and NetSuite   Strong proficiency in Excel and Google Sheets, coupled with excellent data handling skills.   Good organizational skills with a strong attention to detail. Ability to handle multiple priorities.   The ability to simplify complex information   Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills.   Exceptional communication and interpersonal skills, both written and verbal, with fluency in English.   Comfortable working independently in a distributed, dynamic, fast-paced setting.   In addition, you have:    Familiarity with software and SaaS revenue recognition principles under ASC 606 guidance under US GAAP   An optimistic demeanor coupled with a proactive problem-solving attitude, retaining composure in difficult circumstances.   Presentation skills and a willingness to enhance them through continuous growth and development   Previous experience in a publicly traded technology company is highly desirable

column2: News Anchor: A News Anchor is a journalist who presents news stories on television or radio   They are responsible for reporting and delivering news to the audience in a clear and engaging manner   News anchors often work in a studio and collaborate with reporters to deliver the latest news updates   Broadcast Anchor: Broadcast anchors are professionals who host television or radio programs, including talk shows, game shows, or live events   They serve as the central figure in these programs, guiding the audience through the content and engaging with guests or participants   Event Anchor or Master of Ceremonies (MC): At live events, an anchor or master of ceremonies plays a central role in guiding the audience through the event's agenda   They introduce speakers, performers, and segments, interact with the audience, and maintain the flow and energy of the event   Nautical Anchor: An anchor is a heavy object, often with a metal structure, used to secure a ship or boat in a specific location, preventing it from drifting   Nautical anchors are an essential part of maritime operations   Digital Anchor: In the context of online and digital media, a digital anchor refers to a person who serves as the central host or presenter in online videos, live streams, or webinars   They engage with the audience, introduce content, and keep the online event running smoothly
column13: Head Business Development, Head HR, HR

Founded in 2021 by Stanford University dropouts, Aadit Palicha and Kaivalya Vohra, Zepto is India?? fastest growing e-grocery company valued at $1.4 Billion following its recent Series-E fundraise of $200 Million from marquee global investors including StepStone Group, Goodwater Capital, Y Combinator Continuity, Kaiser Permanente, Nexus Venture Partners, Glade Brook Capital, and Lachy Groom.? Zepto is present across 11 major cities in the country, with 1000+ employees strong, and delivering 5000+ products, including fresh fruits and vegetables, daily cooking essentials, dairy, health-and-hygiene products, etc., to Indian homes within 10 minutes. Through strong tech capabilities, an efficient business model, and a network of highly optimized delivery centers across its 10 locations, the company is revolutionizing the Indian grocery segment currently pegged at $600 Billion, making it easier and more convenient. ? Own Brands focus ??uality doesn?? have to cost more?? with that as our motto, we persistently strive to bring affordability to our shoppers and empower them to make smarter choices. Convenience, being the key promise, zepto?? own brands helps take the stress off the customers??of having to make a constant trade-off between high prices & low quality, every day. We are looking for team members who are passionate to develop and present awesome products to our customers delighting them at all times through these super-value offerings. They should be courageous to challenge the status quo and display an uncompromising attitude of driving improved customer experience. We are keen to have team members who are self-motivated and highly driven to join our fast-growing team.? You'll help us build an exclusive high value delivering portfolio of Own Brand products, which not just excites customers, but also our finance team, delivering higher profitability Index.   ? About the role? This role involves designing and developing designing and packaging through a strategic sourcing lens, for a portfolio of product cutting across categories like - Staples, FMCG Food, NonFood & General Merchandise ? Key Responsibilities :  Packaging Development :  Carefully select, develop & execute packaging for a comprehensive portfolio of consumer packs under Staples, Food & Beverage, Home & Personal Care and General Merchandise.Packaging Sourcing. Finalize & optimize the packaging specs for the entire range to provide further sharpness to the product cost competitiveness.   Packaging Sourcing & Commercials  Devise a strategic sourcing & vendor onboarding plan across categories while constantly evaluating the regionalisation of sourcing for better serviceability. Drive open book / cost plus sourcing practice to improve buying efficiency leading to improved margin delivery. Demonstrate high control on development, sourcing & safe keeping of packaging developments capital investments in packaging?   Packaging QC  Ensure the delivery of finished packaging quality as per design. Build a system to manage & control the packaging quality delivery consistently across the product vendors network.   Vendor Selection & Management :  Develop a network of packaging manufacturing partners across the country to effectively source products at most competitive prices for each product. Establish and maintain strong relationships with supplying partners to negotiate favourable terms for the organisation on all sourcing & service aspects.   Maintain Competitive Edge :  Track industry trends & activities to stay ahead in the game and maintain the edge. Stay informed and updated on the emerging packaging trends to facilitate innovation, better product design and development.   Stakeholder Management  Work closely & collaborate with the cross functional team (Product, Quality, Brand, Legal, Compliance, etc.) to achieve the own brand portfolio?? growth aspirations.    ? What We??e Looking For : We are looking for passionate product team members who derive joy out of delighting consumers and improving their life experiences through a portfolio of products delivering super-value. The team member should have :?  A graduate in any function + Postgraduate in packaging from IIP Min. of 15yrs of experience in Packaging development & sourcing Have handled a packaging head position for a min period of 5yrs Ready vendor network to fast track packaging development & launches Sharp negotiation skill with a robust understanding of component costing model Strong analytical mindset with the ability to make data-driven decisions Good knowledge of the Packaging industry and new trends Exceptional leadership and team management skills Excellent communication, conflict management, and problem-solving abilities  ? Why join us? Zepto is the fast-growing quick commerce startup not just in India but globally that delivers groceries in 10 minutes flat. We??e incredibly well-funded and focused on growing the business with profitability in focus. Hence Own Brands is core to our growth strategy which will help improve our margin delivery fast pacing our road to profitability. ?
column13: vendor management, development, project management, analytical, team management, packaging development, investment, business development, sourcing, conflict management, stakeholder management, negotiation, leadership, beverage, buying, communication skills, customer experience

column2: We are looking for a talented full stack Technical Lead for one of the product lines in Matrimony   com   For this role, you will collaborate with a cross-functional team, including engineers and product managers to roll out new features in our products   Ultimately, you need to be extremely hands-on and can take charge of the end-to-end product engineering requirements to deliver unique and customer centric web applications      Key Resposibilities :      Work directly with product managers, designers, architects and developers to refine and ship features to our users.   Lead a team of developers to deliver the product features.   Architecture, design and development for the backend and the frontend.   Proactively optimise client and server code to ensure testability, stability and high performance.   Adapt and iterate quickly based on user feedback and product metrics.   Be a mentor for the team members, and the quality gatekeeper for all features shipped by your team.     Skills and Competencies :     You have experience working at any level of the stack.   You have hands-on experience in building and shipping products/features written in TypeScript/JavaScript.   You have in-depth experience with a JavaScript based frontend library (React, Angular or Vue.js) and Node.js and TypeScript (backend).   You are well versed with CSS or a framework like Tailwind, Bootstrap or Foundation.   You have experience in profiling, analysing heap snapshots, digging into reliability metrics and refactoring code into modular chunks.   You have in-depth experience with data backends like MySQL/PostgreSQL, MongoDB/Cassandra and Redis.   You have experience building out RESTful APIs or GraphQL end-points for high-traffic web applications.   You have experience monitoring and operating a production level service.   You value progress over perfection and have a track record of shipping value to customers.   You re passionate about working together with a team to solve customer problems.   You get excited about teaching and mentoring junior developers.   You strive to write code that lasts for years, not months.   You have an excellent command of written and spoken English.

column2: As we scale by: making more functions tech driven by adding more functional pods (HR, Finance, etc), Acquiring eyewear brands Opening new geographies    We need Productech Leader who is owner of:     All for non-functional requirements like scalability, security, reliability, etc     Generalize local global code base (API Gateway, Transaction database, etc)     Horizontal platforms (e.g. engineering, data, OCTO)     Building core functionality that enables current need of agility and velocity with projection of future needs     Defining Architectural boundaries very well, etc     And become responsible for building products for people who are building products globally, providing global capabilities         Capabilities     Mobile templates     Devops tools     CI / Test Harness     ETL Tools     Security scanners, etc     Services     Coaching     Architecture reviews     Cloud cost optimization     SRE services, etc        Will take direct reporting responsibility of IT Analytics functions     Connect the dots between company strategy technology strategy:   Work with the leadership team to understand the company strategy, set clear priorities and goals for platforms with balancing the long term and immediate needs.  When planning a tech roadmap as distinct from a product roadmap , it s super important that the person has a direct connection to company strategy.   For instance, if your strategy is to be the bank with the best customer service , then investing in an automated ETL pipeline for customer data makes sense so your CRM team has up to date information.     Lead data security, data protection, license, policies and governance     Maximize the return and benefits of investments in technology and tools. Manage strategic vendor and technology partner relationships. Conduct technical reviews of products or solutions to compare and evaluate their capabilities.     Incorporate continuous feedback from the business, vertical and horizontal platforms. Understand and lead the platform team in accordance with the companys needs and growth.     Globally create performance-driven technology matrices and policies that ensure : agility, innovation, collaboration, security and quality behavior in engineering teams. Thus, cultivating a strong, transparent and collaborative engineering culture.     To ensure the technology team continually incorporates up-to-date knowledge of technology standards, emerging technologies, and industry trends.     The ideal candidate would have a broad skill set including analytical horsepower, business judgment, technical aptitude, strong influencing skills, deep curiosity about how things work, and a passion for creating a world-class engineering culture.     You will work with business and tech teams of all sizes and must have the leadership presence and communication skills to represent the team at all levels. This person must be customer-obsessed, have strong self-motivation, and product + organizational skills       Job requirements       Masters/Bachelor s Degree in Engineering, Mathematics / Statistics or equivalent experience. 8+ years of experience in a technological leadership role     Interest in researching technological trends, experience in defining technical product roadmap strategy accordingly and end to end delivery with a track record of delivering features and products at scale.     Demonstrated success leading project delivery for large, cross functional products / programs.     Strong organizational/business planning, understanding of budgets and people development skills.     Experience leading the definition and implementation of a significantly complex product roadmap for a consumer service or product.     Experience with machine learning, tailoring customer experiences to specific local customer needs. Experience in recruiting top talent.

column2: As a Specialist AE within the Cloud Specialist team, your focus will be on the   Heroku   product, a market leading PaaS     You will formulate and execute a Heroku sales strategy within your specific market segment, drive revenue growth by driving demand in the current customer base, and develop new customers    You will use your skills to develop opportunities, through both warm leads and whitespace prospecting     You will work in partnership with the existing Account owners and will carry quota for the Heroku product sales    As a trusted adviser and coach, you are the person with the expertise in Business and Technology Architecture that can match customer needs to the capabilities of the Salesforce Heroku products    You will articulate the business value of the solutions through executive-level time-to-value, ROI and TCO presentations          Your Impact:         You will work closely with current customers and prospective customers as a trusted advisor to deeply understand their unique company challenges and goals.        You will collaborate with customers to evangelize Heroku solutions that will help them reach their business goals and blaze new trails within their organizations.        You will contribute to our business growth in a fast paced, collaborative and fun atmosphere, as a valued member of our Ohana.         Responsibilities:         Develop key customer stakeholder relationships and drive customer satisfaction at assigned accounts        Develop and drive the overall long-term strategy for the account, aligned to customer business objectives        Coordinate internal Salesforce resources to meet customer business needs        Perform account planning at assigned accounts, coordinating with Prime and Cloud sales resources to ensure strategic alignment        Share Salesforce value proposition for existing and/or new customers        Drive growth within an existing assigned account           Required Skills/Experience:         Minimum 10 years plus of experience with full cycle sales familiarity        Ability to strategize with a large extended team        Solid understanding of PaaS solutions with relevant background in Software / Saas Solution selling to the above mentioned Industry verticals will be an added advantage.        Minimum 10 years plus of experience with selling technology solutions        Experience managing and closing complex sales-cycles.Prospecting Skills Consultative/Solution focused selling experience        Strong background selling software/SaaS with outstanding quota attainment history and track record           Desired Skills    /    Experience:         Objection Handling Skills, Discovery Skills, Planning and Closing Skills        Consistent overachievement of goals        Good written, verbal, and presentation skills        Be creative with strong problem-solving skills and the ability to succeed in a fast-paced environment        Background working with a CRM system        Ability to work well as part of an extended sales team         Generous OTE + benefits + uncapped commissions     Benefits      We provide every employee with 7 paid volunteer days off a year, and donation matching for all approved charitable donations. column2: Chief Customer Transformation Advisor (CCTA) is a customer-facing enterprise-wide expert with broad technical skills, deep industry knowledge, and unparalleled business insight   The CCTA supports sales teams in developing Salesforce value propositions that align with our customers business strategies on digital transformation and cloud adoption   The CCTA is a domain expert in one or more categories that may include: business strategy, application architecture, data & information, integration, security, cloud computing, distributed platforms, mobile, and analytics   CCTAs are expected to have strong sales skills and use proven consultative approaches to engage with customers and define their transformation journey along with steps to get there      Here is a list that highlights a CCTAs day job:       Assist the customer in business planning and strategy by focusing on business capabilities and maturity. Understand customer needs, companys products/services and match them with best in class technology to define a north-star target state.     * Help to define prioritization and sequencing of the transformation by proposing a strategic roadmap that leads to the target state. Lead key discussions about change programs from both business and technical perspectives.     Determine which Salesforce and third-party technologies to leverage in customers architecture landscape, based upon product knowledge, industry experience, industry standard Enterprise Architect (EA) frameworks, and Salesforce EA methodologies     Clearly articulate business architecture (mission/vision, capability models, capability assessments) and technical architecture (current and future state diagrams, solution standard methodologies, reference architectures, design patterns).     Provide reliable and trusted -data rich- points of view of relatable customer transformations in the industry ie how other customers with similar needs have succeeded in their transformation.     Assist sales teams in responses to RFPs and technical requirements documents     Travel to customer engagements. This position may be assigned to support one or more geographies and account teams.     Actively engage with account executives and solution engineers to develop opportunities for customer-facing enterprise architecture engagements. Continuously promote and communicate the value of Enterprise Architecture both within the solution engineering community, as well as within the broader sales and customer success organizations.     Participate in all appropriate product/sales training, certifications, educational sessions and industry summits to acquire and maintain the knowledge necessary to be effective in the position.     Share engagement experience with the internal audiences and enrich collective IP. Conduct architecture workshops and other enablement sessions. Mentor and guide junior enterprise architects.     *Work within a matrix-style organisation, collaborating across multiple teams and customers.      Your Impact:      A trusted advisor to CIO/CTO/EA level contacts and their teams as they look to move their business to a cloud architecture. Acting as the Account CTO     A true asset to Salesforce due to broad and deep knowledge of business and technical architecture across all relevant domains.      Minimum Qualifications:      B.S. Computer Science, Software Engineering, Management Information Systems or equivalent     8+ years experience in either software, system or enterprise architecture disciplines     Good understanding of and ability to discuss cloud architecture and principles of modern platforms including SaaS, PaaS, multi-tenancy, multi-tiered infrastructure, etc     Good understanding of enterprise application integration technologies as well as common EA topics such as person based journeys, process orchestration, master data management, analytics and insights, artificial intelligence, etc     Good understanding of security processes, standards & issues involved in multi-tier cloud or hybrid applications     Familiar with Industry or vertical solutions a plus     .Familiar with principles of network, application and information security     Articulate recommendations and ideas with crisp written and verbal communication skills     Preferred Qualifications:      2-3 years relevant in a pre-sales role or customer-facing consultative role     Experience with and deep understanding of key business drivers and technical architecture     Working knowledge of Salesforces platform capabilities, hosting infrastructure, security and integration capabilities     Experience with and exposure to architectural frameworks such as TOGAF, Zachman, etc     Familiar with design thinking and similar principles     Familiar with relevant (regional, vertical, etc) data privacy, risk management, and compliance requirements

column2: This position is needed to scope, design, and deploy machine learning systems into the real world, the individual will closely partner with Product & Engineering teams to execute the roadmap for Twilio s AI/ML products and services   Twilio is looking for a Senior Machine Learning engineer to join the rapidly growing Comms Platform Engineering team of our Messaging business unit   You will understand the needs of our customers and build data products that solve their needs at a global scale   Working side by side with other engineering teams and product counterparts, you will own end-to-end execution of ML solutions   To thrive in this role, you must have a background in ML engineering, and a track record of solving data & machine-learning problems at scale   You are a self-starter, embody a growth attitude, and collaborate effectively across the entire Twilio organization      Responsibilities    Build and maintain scalable machine learning solutions in production   Train and validate both deep learning-based and statistical-based models considering use-case, complexity, performance, and robustness   Demonstrate end-to-end understanding of applications and develop a deep understanding of the why behind our models & systems   Partner with product managers, tech leads, and stakeholders to analyze business problems, clarify requirements and define the scope of the systems needed   Work closely with data platform teams to build robust scalable batch and realtime data pipelines   Work closely with software engineers, build tools to enhance productivity and to ship and maintain ML models   Drive engineering best practices around code reviews, automated testing and monitoring    Qualifications    5+ years of applied ML experience.   Proficiency in Python is preferred. We will also consider strong quantitative candidates with a background in other programming languages   Strong background in the foundations of machine learning and building blocks of modern deep learning   Track record of building, shipping and maintaining machine learning models in production in an ambiguous and fast paced environment.   You have a clear understanding of frameworks like - PyTorch, TensorFlow, or Keras, why and how these frameworks do what they do   Familiarity with ML Ops concepts related to testing and maintaining models in production such as testing, retraining, and monitoring.   Demonstrated ability to ramp up, understand, and operate effectively in new application / business domains.   You ve explored some of the modern data storage, messaging, and processing tools (Kafka, Apache Spark, Hadoop, Presto, DynamoDB etc)    Experience working in an agile team environment with changing priorities   Experience of working on AWS     Desired:     Experience with Large Language Models    What We Offer   There are many benefits to working at Twilio, including, in addition to competitive pay, things like generous time-off, ample parental and wellness leave, healthcare, a retirement savings program, and much more. Offerings vary by location

column2: Nature of Job:   Remote     About The Role:     An X-Team Senior Technical Solutions Manager interacts with potential and current partners in all sectors - from startups to large enterprises across industries. You'll also help maintain strong relationships with our partners, helping to ensure expectations are both realistic and properly being set/reset.     Ultimately what makes for successful partnerships is a combination of strong technical leadership, account / relationship / expectations management, and a team of world-class, forward-moving engineers. This is the X-Team model and what's allowed us to work with the world's leading brands for more than a decade. column2: - Category trends   - Eyewear is undergoing change in category behavior as seen in shoes 2 decades back, where shoes as a category has evolved from customers owning just two set of shoes ??one for office one for play, to owning multiple pairs now.   - While repeat at Lenskart is 4x that of industry ??where typically for industry people buy one pair / 2 years, at lenskart people buy 1+ pairs / year.   - But this is still far behind a mature category like shoes where a person purchases typically are at 4 pairs / year   - Loyalty program   - One thing which has helped Lenskart catalyze this is its gold membership, currently if 100 people buy eyewear from lenskart in a day, more than 80% sign up for gold membership   - This will be one of the key ways to increase repeat reduce churn at Lenskart   Job requirements   Going forward:   As we increase the scale of new user acquisition both by online offline spread ??we intend to scale up the retention significantly by:   - Consumer interviews to qualitatively understand reasons for churn   - Backing them up by detailed data analysis   - Forming strategic view multiple hypothesis to improve retention   - Followed by pilots via different MVP-s to figure out roadmap to get to world class retention rates, making it category first   Job Requirements   - Master's/Bachelor?? Degree in Engineering, Mathematics / Statistics or equivalent experience.   - Experience in fields of Churn / Growth / Loyalty programs   - Experience collaborating with engineering, product, design operations team for end-   to-end implementation of hypothesis, iteration and then scale up   - Demonstrated success leading project delivery for large, cross functional products / programs.   - Experience leading the definition and implementation of a significantly complex product roadmap for a consumer service or product.   - 7-8+ years of experience in the role
column11: B.Tech/B.E. in Any Specialization, Any Graduate, Any Postgraduate

column2: If you re a talented software engineer interested in solving real-world problems and building an amazing business, we may be the perfect place for you to come and do the best work of your life.     What youll do:    - An engineer in this role is expected to design, build, deploy, and manage systems from scratch. You will wear multiple hats of architect , tester or debugger everyone is expected to build systems from scratch. This means that you will need to learn, ideate and innovate on various layers across the stack and that comes with a tremendous amount of learning   - Write code that contributes to Shipmnts core product   - Building state machine models with smart workflow engines   - Building a documentation system that enables massive amount of automation for this industry   - Building an ocean and air logistics quoting and booking engine   - Integrating freight partners, trade experts their service portfolios into our platform   - Developing tools for analytics around global trade, supply chain, freight partners...   - Help build scalable programs that standardize information flow and increase operational capacity   - Be part of a close-knit engineering team that ships new code every day    What youll need:    - Demonstrated experience in developing scalable backend services and implementing web applications - instead of looking at your experience in number of years we dig into your past work to find indicators of a level of competency and maturity signaling somebody with 3+ years of experience and experimentation (needless to say your work portfolio matters a lot to us)   - A product-first approach to building software. You care about the real world functionality of your programming   - Master of the language and platform of your own choosing. We try not to enforce language/platform selection. So whatever you know, you must know it in and out!   - Experience in a fast-paced work environment a bias for action. You ship quality code quickly    What youll get :    - The opportunity to define the engineering culture of a small team   - Founding engineer level equity   - Product ownership - take autonomy over core products product features   - Design write software to help manage and automate the complexity of a multi-trillion dollar industry - "global trade"    What you are:    - Calm under pressure, have a great work ethic and communicate well   - Self-aware and always pushing for a higher standard. Always proactive, open to new ideas and feedback (that last part is very important as we work on rapid agile cycles so being able to process feedback is critical)   - Antifragile: with every failure, you become stronger and better.   - Detail oriented and absolutely intolerant to compromise or sub-optimal shortcuts   - Problem solver with a global mindset    Our Stack (we are not limited to this as we love to experiment):    - Ruby on Rails   - Node.js   - React.js, Redux, React-Native   - Semantic UI   - MongoDB   - Google Cloud Vision APIs   - Phantom.js, Nokogiri...   - Amazon S3, EC2, CloudFront   - R, Python   - Bots EDI...

column2: This position is needed to create high-quality, modern solutions to complex engineering problems and help define the future of Customer Data Platforms   Our mission is to help businesses unlock customer insights and make better decisions faster and cheaper by creating a suite of industry-leading storage and compute services   In this role, you will be responsible for designing and building a suite of storage and compute building blocks that form the foundation of a Customer Data Platform capable of processing billions of profiles   You will play a pivotal role in building a robust and scalable data lake from scratch   You'll also be responsible for mentoring, sharing knowledge, and guiding the technical decisions of the team to set us up for long-term success, both as a product and as a team      Responsibilities    Design and build the next generation of Profiles Data Lake to store, process billions of profiles, and power various use cases across Twilio Data and Applications    Build highly scalable and robust APIs to ingest and access data for internal teams and customers    Build and optimize globally available and highly scalable distributed systems    Collaborate with teams across the engineering organization to ensure services are multi-region capable and meets regulatory requirements    Mentor other engineers on the team on technical architecture and design    Participate in an on-call rotation to support our business-critical infrastructure     Required:     6+ years of experience writing production-grade code in a modern programming language. Deep understanding of architectural patterns of high-scale web application (eg, well-designed APIs, high volume data pipelines, efficient algorithms)    Domain expertise in Modern Data stack with experience in developing cloud-based data solution components and architecture covering data ingestion, data processing and data storage    Have a track record of successfully leading teams, large projects, or owned and built an important, complex system end to end    Ability to influence and build effective working relationships with all levels of the organization    Are passionate about enabling other developers through your leadership and driving teams to efficient decisions    Excellent written and verbal communication skills

column2: Fanatics is searching for an experienced application security specialist to help protect Fanatics-developed applications which are used externally and internally.    A successful candidate will display strong communication and technical skills and be comfortable and effective working independently and as part of a larger, highly distributed team.   Were looking specifically for folks who place an emphasis on usable security and scaling successfully through automation. Fanatics is a fast-growing company, and our security program needs to be able to keep pace with that growth while not disrupting innovation.    Responsible for continually improving product security by partnering with developers in all phases of software development life cycle.    Work with teams to ensure security standards are maintained on the design and implementation of applications and systems in cloud and on-premises environments.        EXPERIENCE REQUIRED:        A minimum of 3 years of experience.       RESPONSIBILITIES:           Establish security best processes and practices for our mobile, on-premises and cloud-based platforms.       Provide expert knowledge and guidance to the product teams about security vulnerabilities and remediation controls.       Support and consult with product and development teams in the area of application security, including threat modeling and Application Security reviews.       Implement, continuously develop, and maintain secure Software Security Development Lifecycle processes and software maturity model.       Perform threat modeling, secure design, and source code review.       Conduct security assessments, security testing and validation of vulnerability scan results.       Assist teams in reproducing, triaging, and addressing application security vulnerabilities.       Incorporate security tools/tasks to automate product development and deployment.     Develop, implement, and automate defensive controls, creating and tuning tools and rules to detect and address malicious activity. Responsible for integration of security controls into SDLC.      Establish supply chain security process and ensure 3rd party software meet the standards.   Facilitate injection, integration, and compliance for Static Application Security Testing (SAST), Container Security Scanning Open-Source Security Analysis during development phase.    Facilitate injection, integration, and compliance for Dynamic Application Security Testing (DAST)   Contribute to triaging, addressing security issues and tracking remediation.   Own and manage Secure SDLC tooling.   Develop and customize security tools used by security teams and developers.   Work closely with development teams to build security directly into their SDLCs.   Provide remediation guidance to programmers and management.   Support bug bounty program   Support the preparation of security releases       Mentor and train development teams on secure coding standards and techniques. Develop Secure Coding Program.       Constantly innovate at the pace of the adversary using latest techniques.          EDUCATIONAL REQUIREMENTS:       Bachelor s degree in computer science, Information Systems, or equivalent combination of education and experience      Certifications in the field of Information Security (at least one of the following: CISSP, CEH, GIAC CPEN, OSCP, OSWE, CWAPT, GWAPT, GWEB)

column2: ? Sr. Engineering Managers (SEMs) lead engineers across levels of diverse groups of people who are moving towards realizing Flipkart?? vision. They set the direction and the long term vision for the team, partner with the product, business, and other stakeholders to realize their vision. The teams work on a spectrum of products and platforms which power Flipkart. They lead the way for the teams to evangelize various ideas, provide technical leadership, and facilitate platformisation of the systems across the ecosystem. SEMs partner with product teams on key business metrics in their areas, lead the way for innovative solutions to complex and challenging domain problems and drive agility in execution by leading by example.? They build a team culture, drive accountability and responsiveness, provide mentorship and career development for the team, and are inspirations for adopting agile methodologies by removing impediments along the way with the big picture in mind. At FSG our vision is to build a world class supply chain platform that provides a reliable, seamless, differentiated supply chain experience to our customers & partners and empowers ekart to operate efficiently & effortlessly With the increasing scale of online shopping in India, the FSG team is working relentlessly to build Flipkart into India's largest e-commerce supply chain services provider, capable of shipping millions of packages every day ! Some of the key initiatives and themes at FSG include Hyperlocal, Grocery, Speed & Segmentation, Customer Experience (Perfect Order), Ekart Externalization, Tech Platformization, Supply Chain Unification, Operations Cost & Efficiency, Enabling Growth via new Supply Chain Constructs. Various teams within FSG include Promise Engine (PE), Fulfillment (FF), Logistics Platform, WMS/Assets, Core Logistics (CL) & Jeeves. What you'll do:  Build, lead, develop and provide hands-on leadership for top-notch engineers and Engineering Managers (EMs) Create clear career paths for team members to help them grow with regular and deep mentoring, attract and retain top talent keeping long term goals in mind Drive strategy and vision across teams in a rapidly evolving environment Work closely with diverse stakeholders and enable them by providing scalable and quality technology solutions. Facilitate platforms solutions that span beyond the team and across the ecosystem Take accountability for moving the key business metrics within your area and Provide thought partnership to the product team and ensure collaboration among product, engineering, and business operation teams. Drive agility in execution, create a strong team culture of responsiveness by leading by example and own decision making around prioritization for better predictability  ? What you??l need:  B.E or B.Tech or any other similar qualification with at least 12+ years of experience in building cutting edge products with 4+ years in people management Good understanding of technology and architecture in a highly scalable and available setup Strong experience handling large data (batch and real-time), workflows and scheduling, building pluggable frameworks and systems, strong abstraction, and design skills. Proven track record of delivering products with high quality, familiarity with multiple software development practices and tools Strong partnership with product and business teams that demonstrates effective collaboration and communication across multiple stakeholders  ?

column2: As a Senior Sales Manager in India you will drive sales, acquire clients & build a partner network in India    You will take ownership of longer term roadmaps and business sales strategy to form a successful revenue generating business strategy    You will play a critical role in the success of Stenn    You will work cross-functionally to deliver revenue for our core three business pillars    SMB Sales, Enterprise Sale and Partnerships    By directing the expansion of Stenn into new global markets you will take hands-on responsibility for hitting revenue targets by driving growth, being an advocate of our product and most importantly providing our customers with immense value    Not only will you grow our revenue streams you will also grow our market presence primarily focussing on Finished Consumer Goods cross-border trade; E-commerce and SaaS; and a geographical focus on India    It will be imperative that you understand how to build sales ecosystems with a product focus as we look to build a category leading product offering with our customer at its core    Ultimately you will be an internal champion of the features/functionality of our most critical SME clients; the primary focus of your role will be to expand our SME relationships by driving acquisition, leveraging sales technologies such as Hubspot and building our wider GTM strategy    All our successes are shared at Stenn and we work collaboratively as one team    Working closely with Structuring, Finance, partnerships, Marketing, Product, Operations and Engineering we aim to build a cohesive commercial function with the end customer in mind    We have a clear mission and vision and need people who want to impact how we get there    Were a rapidly growing team so with this role comes the potential to build and grow a division around you, as the trusted expert in your field      Key responsibilities:      Hit revenue goals and targets: Ultimately this is a sales role. You will have to own end-to-end sales cycles. By setting clear, consistent priorities and actionable goals you will monitor the success of the commercial function.    Partner with internal teams: Work closely with collaborators in internal teams both in the UK and globally (eg. Structuring, Product, Ops, Risk, Sales and Marketing) to solve problems and ensure that feedback received is utilised in improving our product and operations.    Analysis: Quantify everything you do. Utilise data-driven decision making to understand market performance of initiatives to ensure you are effectively prioritising those with the highest return on investment. Using data you will be able to present monthly, quarterly and annual revenue targets to the ELT through effective reporting and bring everyone together with your vision.    Instil trust: Through structured, professional, informed dialogue demonstrate Stenn Technologies as a highly experienced, credible and compelling financing partner to enterprise businesses.    Grow our culture: We re on this journey together and we re still building and working a lot of things out, that s the truly unique part of this opportunity; where the business is at today and the potential we have. Therefore there is a collective responsibility of all of those in our leadership team to work closely with our People and Culture team and the wider business units to make Stenn THE place to work.      Required Experience:      A proven track record of building successful, scalable international commercial teams within FinTech, eCommerce, SaaS or International Trade.    Demonstrated success of building a commercial sales function from the ground up whilst being hands on and delivering personal revenue targets.    Working with product led organisations to build a leading marketplace.    Building a scalable progression roadmap.    Strong understanding of end-to-end sales processes with evidence of building long term collaborative relationships within our target sectors.    The ability to use data and analytics to peasant quantitative and qualitative presentations to make solid business decisions on trajectory.    Strong executive presence and communication skills (verbal and written).    Speed, resourcefulness, and go-getter attitude. Stenn moves incredibly fast and always operates in new spaces whether this be verticals or geographies.    The ability to work under pressure in a fast-paced scaleup environment.    Significant understanding of working / building a diverse and inclusive work environment, culture and team.    A serial over achiever.    Knowledge of regional languages would be a plus

column2: We are seeking a highly qualified and experienced Chartered Accountant with a background in the e-commerce/startup industry to join our team as a Senior Manager   The ideal candidate will have a strong knowledge of accounting principles, compliance regulations, and financial reporting, along with proficiency in accounting software such as Tally, SAP, or ZOHO         Key Qualifications and Skills:    1. Chartered Accountant: Qualified Chartered Accountant with 7-8 years of experience, preferably in the e-commerce/startup industry.  2. Article-ship Experience: Prior article-ship experience from a Big 6 or Medium-sized CA firm is preferred.  3. Accounting Software: Operating knowledge of Tally, SAP, or ZOHO.  4. MS Office: Proficiency in MS Office is a must.  5. Financial Compliance: Good knowledge of IND AS, GST, TDS, Income Tax, The Companies Act, SEBI, and MCA compliance.    Responsibilities:    1) Financial Planning and Budgeting:   Develop and manage the annual budgeting process in coordination with department heads and senior management.   Create budget models, analyze variances, and provide recommendations to ensure alignment with organizational goals.   2) Forecasting and Scenario Analysis:   Prepare accurate and timely financial forecasts considering different business scenarios, market trends, and internal dynamics.   Conduct sensitivity analysis to assess the impact of potential changes on financial outcomes.   3) Financial Analysis and Reporting:   Analyze financial data, trends, and key performance indicators (KPIs) to provide actionable insights to senior management.   Generate regular and ad-hoc financial reports, including variance analysis and performance dashboards.   4) Financial Reporting and MIS:   Overall responsibility of all the GLs creations, nature of the booking, and closures.   Consolidation of financials MIS   Closure of Daily BRS.   Booking of all provisions of expense.   Monthly closure of the books by M+1   Preparing various expense schedules and balance sheet schedules.   Preparing monthly MIS with schedules of all the expenses and balance sheet items.   Preparation and maintenance of FAR.   Calculation of other income - Accrued income capital gain   Analyzing the monthly cost and providing the reason for the variance.   Preparation of financial statements, budgeting, and AOPs.   Working with external stakeholders like auditors, lawyers, etc  Investor reporting MIS.   Plan for the implementation and convergence of the financials and taking the impact of IndAS adjustments.   Responsible for all accounting activities and tracking whether the compliances with various statutes are met.   Creation of Process notes, accounting notes, and guidance notes.   5) Profitability and Cost Analysis:   Assess product/service profitability, cost structures, and pricing strategies to enhance overall business profitability.   Identify cost-saving opportunities and operational efficiencies to optimize resource allocation.   6) Financial Modelling:   Build and maintain financial models to support strategic decision-making, including mergers, acquisitions, investments, and capital allocation.   7) Process Improvement:   Identify opportunities to enhance financial planning and analysis processes, tools, and methodologies.   Implement best practices and drive continuous improvement initiatives within the FPA function.

column2: As a Warehouse Supervisor at Mensa Brands, you will play a crucial role in overseeing and managing our warehouse operations in Bangalore. Y    our primary responsibility will be to ensure the smooth functioning of the warehouse, from receiving and storing goods to order fulfillment and shipment.    We are looking for an experienced professional with a strong background in warehouse management and logistics to join our team.         Responsibilities :     1. Warehouse Operations Management: Oversee day-to-day activities within the warehouse to ensure efficient and effective operations.    2. Inventory Control: Maintain accurate records of inventory levels, conduct regular stock audits, and implement measures to minimize stock discrepancies.    3. Receiving and Dispatch: Supervise the receiving and dispatch processes to ensure timely and accurate handling of incoming and outgoing goods.    4. Order Fulfillment: Coordinate order picking, packing, and shipping to meet customer demands promptly.    5. Quality Assurance: Ensure all products are handled and stored in compliance with safety and quality standards.    6. column2: As a Senior Sales Manager in India you will drive sales, acquire clients & build a partner network in India    You will take ownership of longer term roadmaps and business sales strategy to form a successful revenue generating business strategy    You will play a critical role in the success of Stenn    You will work cross-functionally to deliver revenue for our core three business pillars    SMB Sales, Enterprise Sale and Partnerships    By directing the expansion of Stenn into new global markets you will take hands-on responsibility for hitting revenue targets by driving growth, being an advocate of our product and most importantly providing our customers with immense value    Not only will you grow our revenue streams you will also grow our market presence primarily focussing on Finished Consumer Goods cross-border trade; E-commerce and SaaS; and a geographical focus on India    Ultimately you will be an internal champion of the features/functionality of our most critical SME clients; the primary focus of your role will be to expand our SME relationships by driving acquisition, leveraging sales technologies such as Hubspot and building our wider GTM strategy.      Key responsibilities:      Hit revenue goals and targets: Ultimately this is a sales role. You will have to own end-to-end sales cycles. By setting clear, consistent priorities and actionable goals you will monitor the success of the commercial function.    Partner with internal teams: Work closely with collaborators in internal teams both in the UK and globally (eg. Structuring, Product, Ops, Risk, Sales and Marketing) to solve problems and ensure that feedback received is utilised in improving our product and operations.    Analysis: Quantify everything you do. Utilise data-driven decision making to understand market performance of initiatives to ensure you are effectively prioritising those with the highest return on investment. Using data you will be able to present monthly, quarterly and annual revenue targets to the ELT through effective reporting and bring everyone together with your vision.    Instil trust: Through structured, professional, informed dialogue demonstrate Stenn Technologies as a highly experienced, credible and compelling financing partner to enterprise businesses.    Grow our culture: We re on this journey together and we re still building and working a lot of things out, that s the truly unique part of this opportunity; where the business is at today and the potential we have. Therefore there is a collective responsibility of all of those in our leadership team to work closely with our People and Culture team and the wider business units to make Stenn THE place to work.      Required Experience:      A proven track record of building successful, scalable international commercial teams within FinTech, eCommerce, SaaS or International Trade.    Demonstrated success of building a commercial sales function from the ground up whilst being hands on and delivering personal revenue targets.    Working with product led organisations to build a leading marketplace.    Building a scalable progression roadmap.    Strong understanding of end-to-end sales processes with evidence of building long term collaborative relationships within our target sectors.    The ability to use data and analytics to peasant quantitative and qualitative presentations to make solid business decisions on trajectory.    Strong executive presence and communication skills (verbal and written).    Speed, resourcefulness, and go-getter attitude. Stenn moves incredibly fast and always operates in new spaces whether this be verticals or geographies.    The ability to work under pressure in a fast-paced scaleup environment.    Significant understanding of working / building a diverse and inclusive work environment, culture and team.    A serial over achiever.    Knowledge of regional languages would be a plus

column2: We re looking for exceptional people to join our team, with dual headquarters in Singapore and Seattle, to capture the overwhelming demand across fast growing financial services verticals (neobanks, payments, expense management, lending, investments, insuretech, crypto, etc,) for our rewards solutions.               Join us as a   Senior Director, Business Development (India)        As a Senior Business Development Executive, you report to Ascenda s VP of Business Development, APAC and will be responsible for driving sales within the rapidly evolving Banking industry.    Leveraging your industry knowledge, exceptional communication skills, and a proven track record in sales, you will play a key role in expanding our market presence and revenue growth.    You ll help evolve how we sell by developing a deep understanding of the rewards industry, identifying customers biggest pain points, and educating them on how Ascenda can help unlock massive growth and engagement.                Key responsibilities       Developing and executing sales strategies to achieve revenue goals.    Leading and mentoring junior account executives or sales teams    Rapidly grow Ascenda s customer footprint across India, and the wider APAC region, by cultivating and closing new opportunities with Non-Card Banks s    Own the end-to-end sales cycle across prospecting, first discussions, in-depth consultative collaboration, commercial negotiation, contracting and implementation.    Collaborate deeply with prospects to understand their goals and capabilities to guide them through the process of building growth accelerating rewards products using Ascenda s rewards infrastructure.    Partner closely with Ascenda s Product team to inform how we further elevate our solutions into the future and deliver even greater client impact based on pattern matching needs & pain-points you observe in prospect discussions.    Inform Ascenda s corporate branding, marketing, and communications strategy across channels, increasing our visibility and reputation as a technology leader in the space of customer engagement & rewards.               What we are looking for:        Proven track record of hitting quota selling in a B2B enterprise top-down sales motion to this specific buying persona: senior financial services & fintech leaders (c-suite, head of consumer/corporate credit products, credit cards, lending, payments, banking, etc.) in the Indian market.    Historical success taking a consultative sales approach to deeply understand the needs of prospects across different financial services verticals (consumer banking, corporate banking, credit cards, insurance, etc.) and their end users to pitch compelling solutions to their biggest problems.    Ability to develop a deep understanding of rewards & loyalty strategies in the context of financial services. In particular, the use of rewards as an incentive engine to drive valued behaviors and the rewards economics underlying these programs.    Willingness to go beyond just closing the deal and hitting targets. Focused on how to best address customer biggest needs to develop a long-term relationship.    Strong bias for action and genuine curiosity to help our customers achieve their goals.    A team player that can engage in rigorous debate but also drive consensus towards well-informed, data driven decisions.    Prior product, marketing or business development experience acquired via multiple roles within Banking, loyalty, retail banking organizations.    An inclination for numbers and being data-driven. A lot of this role will rely on analysis of the data the market is giving us, and how that could help us better our process.    Strong strategic thinking and problem-solving skills.    Leadership experience, including the ability to mentor and guide junior team members.    Bonus: Prior experience as a senior operator in a product, strategy, or marketing role in financial services.

column2: As a Planning & Inventory Analyst at Mensa Brands, you will play a critical role in optimizing our supply chain operations by managing inventory levels, forecasting demand, and implementing efficient planning strategies. You will collaborate closely with cross-functional teams to ensure product availability, minimize stockouts, and maximize inventory turnover.       **Responsibilities:**    1. Develop and maintain inventory planning models to optimize inventory levels and ensure product availability while minimizing excess and obsolete inventory.    2. Analyze demand patterns, sales trends, and historical data to forecast future demand for products and raw materials, and develop accurate inventory replenishment plans.    3. Monitor inventory levels across multiple warehouses and distribution centers, and proactively identify and address potential stockouts or overstock situations.    4. Collaborate with procurement and production teams to ensure timely procurement and production of materials and finished goods to meet forecasted demand and inventory targets.    5. Conduct regular inventory audits and reconcile discrepancies between physical inventory counts and system records, implementing corrective actions as necessary.    6. Analyze and report on key inventory metrics such as fill rates, stock turnover, and aging inventory, and identify opportunities for improvement and cost reduction.    7. Partner with cross-functional teams including sales, finance, and operations to develop and implement inventory management policies, procedures, and best practices.    8. Stay informed about industry trends, market dynamics, and supply chain best practices to continuously improve inventory management processes and strategies.    9. Support ad-hoc projects and initiatives related to supply chain optimization, process improvement, and system enhancements as required.       **Requirements:**    1. Bachelors degree in Supply Chain Management, Logistics, Operations Management, or a related field. Advanced degree or professional certification (e.g., APICS) is a plus.    2. 2-4 years of experience in supply chain, inventory planning, or demand forecasting roles, preferably within the e-commerce or retail industry.    3. Proficiency in inventory planning and management tools/software (e.g., ERP systems, demand planning software, Excel).    4. Strong analytical and quantitative skills, with the ability to analyze large datasets, draw insights, and make data-driven recommendations.    5. Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams and communicate complex concepts to stakeholders at all levels.    6. Detail-oriented mindset with strong organizational skills and the ability to manage multiple priorities and deadlines in a fast-paced environment.    7. Proactive problem-solving skills and a continuous improvement mindset, with a commitment to driving operational excellence and efficiency.

column2: This position is for a Senior Analyst role and will be responsible for Analytics and commissions processing for the largest accounts in the company   This role will provide analysis and guidance on resolution while adhering to policies and processes   The end result is excellence in performance and process for the integration of Salesforce with our cloud-based commissions system, Xactly   The Global Incentive Compensation Operation Analyst will be the point of contact for business partners and account executives   This role requires an individual who is able to work in a team environment, be self-motivated, detail-oriented with demonstrated problem solving and decision making skills   This position will partner with cross functional teams and stakeholders, including Sales, Revenue Recognition, Global Deal Desk and Revenue Operations.       Your Impact:      Manage the monthly commission process for a set of sales teams. This includes understanding and applying the commission plan consistently, maintaining quotas and rates, ensuring Xactly commissions calculations comply with the plan, and managing exception requests. Provide expertise, support and training to the international teams on these plans.     Manage processes to identify non-routine transactions, incorrect or incomplete data and to amend and correct sales order and related data. This includes creating and running reports in Salesforce, leveraging Salesforce analytics and Excel to upload and manage data in Salesforce.     Understand the data models, related objects and sales order processes within Salesforce to be able to analyze gaps, provide guidance to sales ops and the sales commission team. Assist in researching customer activity to clarify complex transactions and processes.     Be a key contact and resource for sales account executives, sales operations and sales commission team regarding policy and process of sales commissions and applying that to specific transactions.     Analyze and locate patterns within data to provide accurate and consistent order data and make processes more efficient for future time periods. column2: Vendor Identification and Evaluation:     Conduct market research to identify potential vendors and suppliers in the logistics industry. Establish and maintain mutually beneficial relationships with vendors, fostering collaboration and continuous improvement.   Monitor and enforce vendor compliance with contractual obligations, service level agreements, and quality standards.     Vendor Performance Management:     Define and implement vendor performance metrics and KPIs to assess vendor performance regularly. Collaborate with vendors to drive continuous improvement initiatives and optimize service levels.     Vendor Risk Management:     Identify and mitigate potential risks associated with vendor relationships, such as financial instability, quality issues, or disruptions in the supply chain.   Develop and implement risk mitigation strategies, including contingency plans and alternative sourcing options.     Market Analysis and Benchmarking:     Stay updated with industry trends, market dynamics, and emerging technologies related to logistics and vendor management.   Conduct benchmarking exercises to compare vendor performance, pricing, and service quality against industry standards.     Collaboration and Cross-functional Support:     Collaborate with internal stakeholders, including operations, procurement, and finance teams, to understand their requirements and align vendor selection accordingly. Strong negotiation and communication skills, with the ability to build and maintain relationships with vendors and internal stakeholders.   Familiarity with logistics platforms, software, and tools is preferred.   Proactive and results-oriented mindset, with the ability to work independently and handle multiple priorities in a fast-paced environment.   Experience in RFQs, RFIs and E-Procurement Platforms will be an added advantage.

column2: The stage/The Gig: Software Engineering Flipkart has defined the eCommerce industry in India and will continue its leadership with its core value of putting ??ustomer first?? Flipkart is made of people who love being themselves and their independence of thoughts pave way for disruptive innovation on tech, biz and ops fronts. We are looking for engineers who are well rounded - quality conscious, product thinkers, business congnizant and smart ??not mere coders. Engineers get to significantly amplify their impact with the scale that Flipkart operates at. The same scale also demands the engineers to produce super- efficient solutions. Engineers participate and breed the culture of self-drive which is fuelled with merit based opportunities. In the pursuit of excellence, Flipsters compete against themselves because there is no competitor in the radar. Flipsters??area of work includes advanced information-retrieval algorithms, massive scalability, elastic storage, predictive analytics, fraud detection, inventory planning, supply chain, and large- scale applications that enrich the user experience, to name a few. Working with the market leader, engineers mostly solve challenges-never- seen-before. The environment makes receptive people with open mind and a drive of ownership to succeed and create impact.The excitement gets further fuelled with the impact of flipsters??work felt and complimented by friends and family in India. At Flipkart we miss no opportunity to celebrate our accomplishments. While we work hard, we party harder which helps us work hard again.  Roles and Responsibilities You??e Part: Communication ?Drive discussions to create/improve product, process and technology Coding ?Thinking tools, creating tools ?Build abstractions and contracts with separation of concerns for a larger scope ?Rapid proto-typing ?Robust and scalable web-based applications Design ?Do high level design with guidance; Functional modelling, break-down of a module ?Thinking platforms & reuse Architecture ?Do incremental changes to architecture: impact analysis of the same ?Do performance tuning and improvements in large scale distributed systems Org Development ?Mentor young minds and foster team spirit ? You??e Array (Nice to Haves): ?The farsightedness it takes to look at business problems critically from more than one perspective. ? ?The capability to craft object-oriented models and design data structures, implement business logic and data models with suitable class design. ?Ability to break-down larger/fuzzier problems into smaller ones in the scope of the product ?Sound soft skills to gel with colleagues from other teams in order to harness the development process. ?An understanding of the industry?? coding standards and an ability to create appropriate technical documentation. You (Must Haves): ?Extensive and expert programming experience in any one programming language (strong OO skills preferred). Deep experience in at least one general programming language (Java, Ruby, Clojure, Scala, C/C++ and SQL) ?A solid foundation in computer science, with strong competencies in data structures, algorithms, and software design. ?Have a penchant for solving complex and interesting problems ?Worked in startup like environment with high levels of ownership and commitment ?BTech, MTech, or PhD in Computer Science or related technical discipline (or equivalent). ?Excellent coding skills ??should be able to convert design into code fluently Good skills to write unit & integration tests with reasonable coverage of code & interfaces - TDD is a plus ?Experience in building highly scalable business applications, which involve implementing large complex business flows and dealing with huge amount of data. Experience with multi-threading and concurrency programming ?3 years and above exposure in the art of writing codes and solving problems for large scale. You??e Cheers! Apart from all the general benefits of best in industry compensation, equity, healthcare etc , Flipart prides in calling out the big hand for you to be ?Great Work, Great People and Great environment. We call ourselves an incubator for engineers where you get all the optimal conditions to do and experience your best.

column2: Reporting to the Controller, the Accounting Manager will be responsible for maintaining accurate books and records within one of our US-based entities and one of our foreign-based entities    For the US-based entity, Biofourmis Inc, he or she will be one of two managers responsible for daily, monthly, quarterly and year-end activities    For the foreign-based entity, Biofourmis AG, he or she will be responsible for the full set of accounts    The Accounting Manager will be a member of a small, but evolving, high-performing team and expected to help with the implementation of financial processes and procedures    The ideal candidate will have eight or more years of accounting experience, strong communication skills and superb attention to detail    This role has the potential of becoming the lead team member for our Center of Excellence with direct reports being added to the team as we continue to grow       Responsibilities       Own monthly close calendar, ensuring team meets financial reporting deadlines;    Work with supply chain in both US and Singapore to ensure preparation and maintenance of accurate accounting books and records and compliance with accepted policies and procedures of inventory and inventory-related transactions;    Assist with month-end, quarter-end and year-end close processes, including preparation of journal entries, reconciliations and roll-forward schedules as well as intercompany reconciliations for inventory;    Oversee staff accountant to ensure monthly sales invoices for Biofourmis Inc, our US entity, are being posted appropriately, reconciled and distributed to customers;    Prepare the full set of accounts for Biofourmis AG, our foreign entity, including but not limited to accounts payable, accounts receivable, and inventory;    Resolve accounting discrepancies and irregularities, including proposing reclassifications as needed;    Serve as primary liaison with external auditors; and    Participate in ad hoc accounting and finance projects, as appropriate.       Qualifications       Bachelor s degree in accounting, finance or a related field;    Expertise in U.S. GAAP;    Minimum of 8 years of experience in public accounting, public company and/or multi-national company;    Experience with the use of ERP systems, with Microsoft Dynamics 365 experience preferred;    Exceptional verbal and written communications skills;    Exceptional analytical, quantitative and problem-solving skills;    Superb attention to detail;    Resilient team player who can juggle multiple priorities and competing deadlines;    Puts in extra effort when needed to meet agreed-upon deadlines;    Inspires others to take positive action and looks for opportunities to positively contribute to and improve the finance team;    Possesses integrity and judgment and upholds professional values (e.g., by maintaining confidentiality, respecting cultural differences); and    Hard-working, motivated and reliable with a desire to learn and succeed in a demanding role.

column2: We are looking for a Platform Engineer, who is passionate about Golang/Serverless and building high-quality and scalable products. We believe in ownership and are looking for people driven to continuously ship new, impactful features and capabilities for our users and partners. Seasoned ability to design, develop and test new functionality, whilst ensuring the platform is always robust and scalable.       Key Responsibilities:     Setup, maintain and evolve the external routing procedures for user s deployments with Envoy or other options.   Build an internal private network for dynamically meshing together services on the platform.   Build Golang GRPC services from scratch capable of supporting tens of thousands of users, and the million+ to come.   Define infrastructure that can be torn down, failed over, and reconstituted from scratch using the principle of immutable infrastructure using Terraform and Ansible.   Interface with our TypeScript and GraphQL edge to expose your microservice APIs for both internal and potentially external consumption.   Architecting and building highly available and scalable architectures and backends.   Working with product and design to creatively solve complex problems.        Required Skills:     A strong understanding of distributed systems. You enjoy building fault-tolerant, resilient, and scalable services.   A solid intuition about how long your solutions will last. All systems age. In startups, we can hope for 2-3 orders of magnitude, or 12-18 months.   A sense of grit to dive into a problem, implement a solution, scale that solution, and replace it when needed.   1+ years of experience of relevant experience. column2: Join our team as a Commerce Cloud Success Architect and be a pivotal player in driving success for our customers within the Commerce Cloud product portfolio. As a Subject Matter Expert (SME), you'll contribute to the growth and reputation of Salesforce as a leader in the industry. We are seeking a passionate B2C Commerce Architect with significant experience in delivering B2C Commerce Cloud solutions to large enterprise organizations.    Responsibilities:      Customer Engagement:   Engage with our Signature Success Plan customers, evaluating and recommending optimization strategies for technical architecture, DevOps, performance, and solution design specific to B2C Commerce.    Lead with Expertise:   Serve as a trusted Commerce Cloud SME for our broader Success Architect organization, providing proactive and reactive Architecture, Technology Strategy & Thought Leadership, and Product expertise.    Communication Mastery:   Translate complex technical concepts for diverse audiences, ranging from Technical and Business stakeholders to Executive Leadership, establishing yourself as a trusted advisor in crucial conversations.    Innovation and Problem Solving:   Identify and evaluate capability gaps, recommending standard product enhancements or creative custom solutions to maximize customer success and adoption.    Playbook Execution:   Develop and execute playbooks aligned with our Success Architect engagement catalog, tailored to the unique needs and opportunities of Commerce Cloud customers.    Relationship Building:   Build strong relationships with both internal and external business partners, collaborating on initiatives that contribute to broader goals and growth.     Impact of the Role:   As a Commerce Cloud Success Architect, you will have a significant impact on our customers success and the growth of our organization. Your expertise and guidance will directly influence the technical architecture, performance optimization, and solution design strategies for our customers, ensuring their success in leveraging Commerce Clouds powerful capabilities. By driving customer satisfaction and delivering exceptional value, you will contribute to the overall growth and reputation of Salesforce as a leader in the industry.    Collaboration and Teamwork:   Collaboration is at the core of our success, and as a Commerce Cloud Success Architect , you will have the opportunity to work closely with diverse teams of professionals. You will collaborate with customers, colleagues, and partners to evaluate technical architecture, optimize performance, and design effective solutions. By fostering strong relationships and working collaboratively, you will contribute to the collective success of our teams and the achievement of our goals.    Basic Requirements:      Proven Experience:   5 years proven experience in enterprise consulting, including implementing enterprise software solutions in the Commerce space as a lead developer or architect    Commerce Cloud Expertise:    Experience with Salesforce B2C Commerce platform    Salesforce certifications:   B2C Commerce Developer, B2C Commerce Architect     Technical Competence:       Deep understanding of data modeling, integration architectures, and data governance best practices.   Good understanding of B2C Commerce development tools (Script API, Pipelines, OCAPI/SCAPI, PWAKit)   Understanding of web technologies like HTML, SQL, Javascript, XML, JSON, and CSS.   Experience with system architecture design and integration patterns      Interpersonal Skills:   Excellent communication skills, and ability to work collaboratively with cross-functional teams from Developer to Executive    Proactive mindset:   Proactive and self-starting attitude with the ability to manage tasks independently while collaborating remotely with customers and colleagues    Data Ethics and Privacy:   Values the importance of Data Ethics and Privacy by ensuring that customer solutions adhere to relevant regulations and best practices in data security and privacy     Preferred Requirements:      Salesforce Knowledge:   Knowledge in Salesforce Order Management and Salesforce B2B Commerce; Experience implementing Salesforce Clouds, Multi-cloud scenarios - Sales, Service, Industries or Marketing    Salesforce Knowledge:   Additional Salesforce certifications (Salesforce Administrator, Experience cloud, B2B)    Technical Familiarity:   Familiarity with Salesforce s technical architecture: APIs, Standard and Custom Objects, APEX, AI concepts, Customer Data Platforms or Data Lakes
